builds.description: A casino on the Ross 4 server in which you could spend 1 diamond to roll. You had a 1 in 5 chance of winning, and the prize was 3 diamonds. Unfortunately, it got griefed by {p,nattgall,Nat} and used to make a weird contraption at spawn.

images.caption: The rules and instructions of the casino.

builds.name: Nat's Base (Ross 4)
builds.description: A small little house at spawn, in which {p,nattgall,Nat} lived. It has storage, a little farm, an enchantment table attic, and a secret valuables chamber underneath.

images.caption: Secret chamber with a valuables shulker box and armor stand.

builds.name: Fish Tank (Ross 4)
builds.description: A small little axolotl tank at spawn.

builds.name: Sr. Bones' Carpintería
builds.description: Sr. Bones' Carpintería is one of three wood shops at spawn on Ross 4. It sold spruce wood as opposed to birch or oak at the other wood shops.

builds.name: Grand Oak Tree
builds.description: Originally {p,nattgall,Nat's} oak wood shop, now a massive tree with wood to buy inside, and a village spread amongst the leaves.

images.caption: At the top of the stairs, an area where you can buy emeralds and things from a villager.
A place to drink your sorrows away.
A set of rooms where villagers live.
The top of the tree, with more areas to sit, and a little pool :3

builds.name: Evan's Wood Shop
builds.description: The ORIGINAL wood shop on Ross 4 in which you can buy birch wood. It competed heavily with {b,181,Nat's wood shop}

builds.name: Cherry Tree
builds.description: The Cherry Tree of spawn is a decorative-only piece.

builds.name: Rojas' Achievement Emporeum
builds.description: A shop where you could pay to unlock specific advancements.

builds.name: Nat's Rocket Shop
builds.description: Nat. Rocket Shop.

builds.name: Zielinski's Rail Shop
builds.description: A shop to buy rails.

builds.name: Spawn Stage
builds.description: A stage, which events were hosted, such as {e,12,Nat's magic show.}

builds.name: Evil Meteor
builds.description: The meteor that crashed into the world granting the players illegal items.

builds.name: Statue of Gall
builds.description: The statue of Gall, to be superceded by the Statue of Miles.

images.caption: Statue of Gall before {p,mil_es,Miles} statue or {p,ThatShort1,Owen} vandalism.

builds.name: Monument of Miles
builds.description: The monolith built above {b,189,Statue of Gall.}

builds.name: Zielinski's Fossile Fuels
builds.description: A place where you could buy signature "OFFICIAL ZIELINSKI FOSIL FUEL OZONE DESTROYER 💀" coal.

builds.name: Nat's Parkour
builds.description: A parkour course in which {p,nattgall,Nat} would have contestants try to make it to the top in the quickest time.

builds.name: House of Moth
builds.description: The house for the Ross residents of {b,194,zandgall's village.}

builds.name: Zandgall's Village
builds.description: A village where villagers were given actual houses and workplaces and community spaces. The "ethical" village, it could be called.

builds.name: Farmhouse
builds.description: A large farm in {b,194,zandgall's village} where wheat, pumpkin, and melon grows. A timelapse exists showing the creation of the farm, and can be viewed here: https://youtu.be/a-TonfMzXkw.

builds.name: Duplex
builds.description: A duplex, just about it.

builds.name: Zandgall's Garden
builds.description: A pretty little garden, with lots of different types of flowers, beehives, and a pond.

builds.name: Mini-Mart
builds.description: Mini-Mart was a build by Emmett (markiplierfan12) at spawn of ROSS3.0. Intended to be a shop, it was never fully restocked.

builds.name: Red Team Tower
builds.description: The Red Team Tower was an unfinished spawn tower intended to be the 'hub' for red team members (Sasha, Teddy, Emmett, miles, ThatShort1, Evan).

builds.name: Evan's Base (ROSS 3.0)
builds.description: Evan's base for ROSS 3.0.

zandgall.description: Zandgall is the owner and main coordinator of Ross.
zandgall.controversies: Zandgall was a notorious tyrant, often wielding power they had no place using. Also there was that time they dropped a rock on this guy walking underneath a bridge they were on and he didn't get back up

LordStarscream.description: The second person to be a part of Ross, before it was even known as Ross.

BaconWaffle3213.description: One of the earliest core Ross members. There since Ross 1. The Ocean Monument guy.

DubTron.description: One of the first Ross Members, helped make it more of a community.

larzerboy.description: One of the first Ross members

lazytagger.description: Joined early into the realm's life, though the exact date is unknown.
lazytagger.controversies: Was known for hacking and duping on {s,Ross 1,Ross 1}. nword..

dootdootbih.controversies: burned evan BE house to the ground...

groups.name: RocketPowered
groups.description: RocketPowered was a coalition between {p,zandgall,zandgall} and {p,DubTron,DubTron.} Usually spending their time as a group building and maintaining farms and shops.
